overview:
David Friermor is a UC Santa Barbara Business Economics and Entrepreneurship graduate with a focus in technology start-ups. In 2007 David became a managing partner of Twisted Nature Media. David worked along side TNMâ€™s founder Jordan Townsend, helping lead TNM to gross more than $100,000 annually over their next 4 years, focusing primarily on Facebook traffic monetization.

In early 2011, David worked with a Calabasas, CA based start-up, ProDIGIQ, in advertising sales. David quickly became ProDIGIQâ€™s lead sales manager focusing on their lead product, The Airport TV Network.

In Davidâ€™s senior year at UCSB, he and Jordan brought ClassWave.com, what was SchoolBook back then, to the semi-finals of the 2011 UCSB New Venture Competition. In addition, David graduated from UCSBâ€™s Technology Management Program in addition to being a Director of the Student Entrepreneurs Association.
